about_the_game:
Strange, colorful and unusual; Escaping DandyLand is unlike any else preceding in the genre of frustration platformers. Can you traverse the central spire and escape? Can you discover the secret of its true nature?

Experience the challenge that is its platforming! See vistas of its strange land! Meet bizarre, peculiar and perhaps to some unhinged characters! Defy the lands strange and unsettling proprietor!

Equipped with magic boots, lunge through the air to achieve both high and long jumps, if you can master them! Use them to achieve “Coyote Time” to re-direct your movement mid-air!



Escaping DandyLand is a game experience unique amongst its contemporaries in the “Up-like” genre with its surreal aesthetic. Can you reach the peak and discover what lies beyond?

Features :

  • Gameplay : Yes !
  • Characters : Bizarre and forgettable no matter how hard you try ! Unhinged dialogue with bouts of bawdy & bodily humor.
  • Music : Its there somewhere !
  • Aesthetic : A strange and surreal environment, where else can you find the alien and abstract along side jesters and fairies ?
  • Story : Obtuse !


Photosensitivity Warning.

content_descriptors.notes:
Dialogue between characters that contains crude and absurd language. 

Photosensitivity Warning.

name: Escaping DandyLand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: intel core i5 4460 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 720 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent

short_description: Strange, colorful and unusual; Escaping DandyLand is unlike any else preceding in the genre of frustration platformers. Can you traverse the central spire and escape? Can you piece the secret of its true nature together?
